Question
========
  
What do we aim to determine with a reliability analysis?

Answerlist
----------
* How much of the test variance is true variance and not explained by random measurement errors.
* How much of the test variance is true variance and not explained by systematic measurement errors.
* To what extent the test measures what it intends to measure.
* The correlation between two halves of the test.

Solution
========
* True 
* False 
* False 
* False
